attributes.action: Access to fertility treatment equal for both same-sex and heterosexual couples
attributes.additional_details: It is unjust and unfair and it discriminates against a minority group.
attributes.background: The NHS guidelines recommend that IVF should be offered to women  who have been trying to get pregnant through regular unprotected sex for 2 years. Same-sex couples can't try and get pregnant, therefore, this guidance needs to be rectified, as it currently discriminates against same-sex couples.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599727
